campsites.name: React Lake Campground
campsites.description: Nestled in the foothills of the Chrome Mountains, this campground on the shores of the pristine React Lake is a favorite for fly fishers.

campsites.name: Chrome River Campground
campsites.description: Spend a few sunny days and starry nights beneath a canopy of old-growth firs at this enchanting spot by the Chrome River.

campsites.name: Breadcrumb Trail Campground
campsites.description: Let NuCamp be your guide to this off-the-beaten-path, hike-in-only campground.

campsites.name: Redux Woods Campground
campsites.description: You'll never want to leave this hidden gem, deep within the lush Redux Woods.

comments.message: This is definitely a 3 star rating!
I love olaf to be here!
Elsa is definitely not gonna be here!

partners.name: Bootstrap Outfitters
partners.description: Bootstrap Outfitters supplies you with the gear you need at prices you can't beat.

partners.name: Git Out Expeditions
partners.description: Join Git Out Expeditions to explore new horizons with a group of other adventurers!

partners.name: Mongo Fly Shop
partners.description: Need a new fishing pole, a tacklebox, or flies of all kinds? Stop by Mongo Fly Shop.

partners.name: Node Outdoor Apparel
partners.description: From polar fleeces to swimsuits, hiking boots to waders, a visit to Node will be sure to get you covered.

promotions.name: Mountain Adventure
promotions.description: Book a 5-day mountain trek with a seasoned outdoor guide! Fly fishing equipment and lessons provided.

promotions.name: Into The Weeds
promotions.description: 5 days deep in the Redux National Monument, far from the beaten path, with only a reducer in your backpack.  Guide provided.

promotions.name: Bootstrap Teardown
promotions.description: In this weekend workshop we'll rebuild your bootstraps from scratch, so you're ready for next-level excursions.

promotions.name: Asynchronous Rendezvous
promotions.description: Meet up with your guide at the top of Promise Mountain.  Or, try to.  Good luck!
